rajarata wakugadu rogaye mularambhaye sitama ema wishayata baddhawi katayuthu kala waidya pradeshiya saukhya sewa adhyaksha palitha bandara mahatha mehidi karunu pahadili kirimak kaleya. 2002 di padawiye pradeshiya lekamwarayage warthawak padanam karagena thamayi rajarata pathirena hethu rahitha wakugadu rogaya gana rajaye saha waidya anshawala awadhanaya yomu wune aarambhayedi anuradhapura disthrikkayen wakugadu rogin handuna gaththe janagahanayen 4.2% k pamanayi.
